name: DIP DEEPER
description:
Q - W - O - P to DIP
SPCEBAR  to eat that juicy chicken drumstick

made for ludum dare 48 ,theme was "deeper and deeper"

so many things to do,so little time… congratulations to anyone who managed to submit something.
